description.translate:
Unlike the other fairy courts, the $(b;autumn)Autumn court$() is an empty throne ruled by none. 
 We do however have a $(b;spring)sovereign$(), the $(b;autumn)Pumpkin King$().
 As the name may suggest, he is not a real King, he is more a lord of mischief and fear.
 But we indulge him since no autumn fey is foolish enough to take on the mantle of Autumn Ruler.

I will leave the choice of preparing a dish to you this time! A $(b;autumn)Stuffed Pumpkin$()? ...Well, I support your decision sweetie...$(b;spring)Gift$() it to me when it's done!

description.text:
Very well! One stuffed Pumpkin, for the $(b;autumn)Pumpkin King$()! 

$(b;autumn)-The Pumpkin King has received your gift, and offers you a gift in return...It's unsure if he appreciated your offering, or he is sending you a message...-$()
